AIRCZ Type: AIRPORTDescription: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

description: T.1 Ash -Lateral reduction to provide 2m clearance from property & crown lift to 6m from ground level. T.2 Yew - Lateral reduction to provide 2m clearance from property & trim to shape sympathetically.T.4 Elder - Exempt.T.5 Scots Pine -  Lateral reduction to provide 2m clearance from property & deadwood.T.6 Sumach - ExemptT.7 Lime - 2m Holistic crown reduction, crown thin by 20%, crown lift to 4m from ground level & deadwood.
